elements.label: Allow full screen
elements.helpText: Allows content (e.g. a video player) to be resized to fit the entire screen.

elements.label: Show scroll bars
elements.helpText: If selected, the Embed code compoenent will show scrollbars if the content surpasses the set width and height dimensions.

elements.label: Height
elements.helpText: Height of Embed code compoenent (e.g. 300px, 100%). If not set, the height defaults to the height of the content.

elements.label: Width
elements.helpText: Width of Embed code compoenent (e.g. 300px, 100%). If not set, the width defaults to fill available space.
